青.definition: green; blue; black; youth; young (of people)

青出於藍而勝於藍.pinyin: qing1 chu1 yu2 lan2 er2 sheng4 yu2 lan2
青出於藍而勝於藍.definition: lit. the color blue is made out of indigo but is more vivid than indigo (idiom); fig. the student surpasses the master

青原.definition: Qingyuan district of Ji'an city 吉安市, Jiangxi

青原區.definition: Qingyuan district of Ji'an city 吉安市, Jiangxi

青堂瓦舍.definition: brick house with a tiled roof

青天.definition: clear sky; blue sky; upright and honorable (official)

青天白日.definition: (idiom) in broad daylight; in the middle of the day; KMT emblem, a white sun on a blue background

青天霹靂.definition: lit. thunderclap from a clear sky (idiom); fig. a bolt from the blue

青字頭.definition: "top of 青 character" component in Chinese characters (龶)

青山區.definition: Qingshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei; Qingshan district of Baotou city 包頭市|包头市[Bao1 tou2 shi4], Inner Mongolia

青山綠水.definition: lit. green hills and clear waters; pleasant country scene (idiom)

青岡縣.definition: Qinggang county in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang

青島.definition: see 青島市|青岛市[Qing1dao3 Shi4]

青島市.definition: Qingdao, sub-provincial city in Shandong Province 山東省|山东省[Shan1dong1 Sheng3]

青年.definition: youth; youthful years; young person; the young

青年團.definition: youth corps; youth wing of a political party

青年會.definition: YMCA (international Christian youth movement, formed in 1844)

青年節.definition: Youth Day (May 4th), PRC national holiday for young people aged 14 to 28, who get half a day off

青旅.definition: youth hostel; abbr. for 青年旅舍[qing1 nian2 lu:3 she4]

青春不再.definition: lit. one's youth will never return; to make the most of one's opportunities (idiom)

青果.definition: Chinese olive (Canarium album); green unripe fruit; (Tw) fresh fruits

青梅竹馬.definition: lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom); fig. innocent children's games; childhood sweethearts; a couple who grew up as childhood friends

青棗.definition: blue or green jujube; Chinese green date

青森.definition: Aomori prefecture at the far north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

青森縣.definition: Aomori prefecture at the far north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

青檀.definition: blue sandalwood (Pteroceltis tatarinowii Maxim), the bark of which is used to manufacture 宣紙|宣纸

青檀樹.definition: blue sandalwood (Pteroceltis tatarinowii Maxim), the bark of which is used to manufacture 宣紙|宣纸

青江菜.definition: bok choy; Shanghai pak choy; Chinese mustard (Brassica rapa Chinensis)

青河.definition: Qinggil county or Chinggil nahiyisi in Altay prefecture 阿勒泰地區|阿勒泰地区[A1 le4 tai4 di4 qu1], Xinjiang

青瓦臺.definition: the Blue House (or Cheong Wa Dae), formerly the residence of the president of South Korea in Seoul (1948-2022), now a public park

青田.definition: Qingtian county in Lishui 麗水|丽水[Li2 shui3], Zhejiang

青田縣.definition: Qingtian county in Lishui 麗水|丽水[Li2 shui3], Zhejiang

青眼.definition: (to look) with a direct gaze; (fig.) respect; favor

青睞.definition: (literary) (lit.) to fix one's gaze on; (fig.) to show interest in; (favorable) attention; favor

青紅幫.definition: traditional secret society, Chinese equivalent of Freemasons

青紅皂白.definition: the rights and wrongs of a matter (idiom)

青絲.definition: fine black hair; dried plum (sliced, as cake ingredient)

青綠山水.definition: blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)

青縣.definition: Qing county in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei

青腳鷸.definition: (bird species of China) common greenshank (Tringa nebularia)

青蔥.definition: scallion; green onion; verdant; lush green

青蝦.definition: oriental river prawn (Macrobrachium nipponense), a species of freshwater shrimp

青衣.definition: black clothes; servant (old); young woman role in Chinese opera, also called 正旦[zheng4 dan4]

青釉.definition: celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze

青金石.definition: lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)

青銅.definition: bronze (alloy of copper 銅|铜 and tin 錫|锡[xi1])

青銅器.definition: bronze implement; refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC

青銅器時代.definition: the Bronze Age; also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]

青雲.definition: clear sky; fig. high official position; noble

青馬大橋.definition: Tsing Ma Bridge (to Hong Kong Airport)

青黃不接.definition: lit. yellow does not reach green (idiom); the yellow autumn crop does not last until the green spring crop; temporary deficit in manpower or resources; unable to make ends meet

青黛.definition: indigo (dye); Indigo naturalis extract (used in TCM)

青龍.definition: Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]; (slang) man without pubic hair
